entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:41 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: E 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain except rain over southern sections. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
